$comment: All of the attributes for the Sample object can be found here.
description: The properties of the Sample object.

name.description: The name given to the Sample.

version.description: The version given to the Sample.

experimenter.description: The experimenter who worked on the Sample

versionDescription.description: Description of the version of the Sample
examples: This is the initial version of the sample.

dnaConcentrationNotes.description: Notes about the Dna concentration of the sample.

growthMedia.description: Growth media information of the sample.

nuclAcidExt.description: Nucleic Acid Extraction of the sample.

lysisBufferVolume.description: Lysis buffer volume of the sample.

proteinaseKVolume.description: Proteinase K volume of the sample.

qubitDNAConcentration.description: Qubit DNA concentration of the sample.

notes.description: Sample notes, additional information about the sample.

dnaNotes.description: Sample DNA notes, additional information about the sample DNA.

unusableDna.description: Is there any unusable DNA in the sample.

sampleType.description: The selected type of the sample.

fermentationTemperature.description: The fermentation temperature of the sample.

extractionSolvent.description: The Extraction Solvent of the sample.
